headline: Bernstein names Big Beautiful tax refunds winners
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein says a wave of “Big Beautiful” tax refunds could reshape U.S. consumer spending patterns in 2026, with several retail and leisure names best positioned to benefit.

headline: Ross Stores' Q4 2025 Earnings: What to Expect
summary: Ross Stores will release its fourth-quarter earnings soon, and analysts anticipate a single-digit bottom-line growth.

headline: A Look At Ross Stores (ROST) Valuation After Strong Results And Renewed Investor Interest
summary: Why Ross Stores (ROST) Is Back on Investors’ Radar Ross Stores (ROST) is drawing fresh attention after solid quarterly results, ongoing store expansion, and steady same store sales growth combined with increased interest from institutional investors. See our latest analysis for Ross Stores. That renewed interest is showing up in the price action, with a 90 day share price return of 22.76% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 29.82%, suggesting momentum has been building around recent...
